name: BigCommerce Sample App, Python
description: Sample app for the BigCommerce app store. Handles installation flow and runs an API request, uses the response data to render an interface.

SESSION_SECRET.description: Random string used to secure the flask session cookie.

APP_URL.description: The public URL of your Heroku app.
APP_URL.value: This will be replaced after deployment

DEBUG.description: Boolean used to put Flask, SQLAlchemy, and other addons into a verbose logging and debug mode. Leave it True for now, but be sure to set it to False for a production app release!

APP_CLIENT_ID.description: Replace this with the BigCommerce Client ID

APP_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Replace this with the BigCommerce Client Secret
